title: Contact
summary: Get in touch with QuantumPoly for inquiries, support, or collaboration opportunities.
intro: We welcome your questions, feedback, and collaboration inquiries. Please use the contact information below to reach the appropriate team.

general.label: General Inquiries
general.description: For general questions about QuantumPoly, our services, or partnership opportunities.

legal.label: Legal & Compliance
legal.description: For legal matters, compliance questions, or official correspondence.

privacy.label: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.description: For data protection inquiries, privacy concerns, or GDPR-related requests.

trust.label: Ethics & Governance
trust.description: For ethical concerns, governance questions, or security vulnerability reports.

accessibility.label: Accessibility
accessibility.description: For accessibility feedback, barrier reports, or assistive technology support.

response.heading: Response Times
response.note: For urgent security vulnerabilities, please email trust@quantumpoly.ai directly. Do not open public GitHub issues for security concerns.

links.heading: Additional Information
links.imprint: For complete legal information, please see our
links.privacy: For data handling details, please see our
links.governance: For ethical governance information, please see our

disclaimer: This contact information is provided for communication purposes only and does not constitute legal advice or create any contractual relationship.
